00001 #include "mathcursor.h"
00002 #include "mmldocument.h"
00003 #include "mmlelement.h"
00004 #include "mmltext.h"
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 MathCursor::MathCursor(MMLDocument *o)
00009         : owner(o) {
00010         current = owner->documentElement();
00011         ancestry.resize(32, 0);
00012         ancestry[0] = current;
00013         int i = 0;
00014         MMLNode *n;
00015         do {
00016                 n = ancestry[i]->firstChild();
00017                 ancestry[++i] = n;
00018         } while (n);
00019         level = 0;
00020         targetlevel = 0;
00021         offset = 0;
00022 }
00023 /* move to the next sibling */
00024 MMLNode *
00025 MathCursor::moveNext() {
00026         if (current->isText()) {
00027                 const MMLText *t = static_cast<const MMLText *>(current);
00028                 if (offset < t->data().length()) {
00029                         ++offset;
00030                         return current;
00031                 }
00032         }
00033         MMLNode *node = 0;
00034         if (ancestry[level+1]) {
00035                 node = ancestry[++level];
00036                 // set the offset in the next level to the right
00037                 ancestry[level+1] = node->firstChild();
00038         } else {
00039                 if (level == 0) return current;
00040                 node = ancestry[--level];
00041                 ancestry[level+1] = ancestry[level+1]->nextSibling();
00042         }
00043         current = node;
00044         offset = 0;
00045         return current;
00046 }
00047 MMLNode *
00048 MathCursor::movePrevious() {
00049         if (current->isText()) {
00050                 if (offset > 0) {
00051                         --offset;
00052                         return current;
00053                 }
00054         }
00055         MMLNode *node = 0;
00056 
00057         // the node mentioned in the ancestry at level+1 is the one to the
00058         // right of the current point. We need the one to the left of it.
00059         MMLNode *prev = ancestry[level+1];
00060         if (prev) {
00061                 prev = prev->previousSibling();
00062         } else {
00063                 prev = current->lastChild();
00064         }
00065         if (prev) {
00066                 // if there is a previous node, go to it
00067                 node = prev;
00068                 // set the node to the now current level
00069                 ancestry[++level] = node;
00070                 // set the offset in the next level to the left
00071                 ancestry[level+1] = 0;
00072         } else {
00073                 // else descend one level, if possible
00074                 if (level == 0) return current;
00075                 node = ancestry[--level];
00076                 //ancestry[level+1] = ancestry[level+1]->previousSibling();
00077         }
00078         current = node;
00079         if (current->isText()) {
00080                 const MMLText *t = static_cast<const MMLText *>(current);
00081                 offset = t->data().length();
00082         }
00083         return current;
00084 }
00085 MMLNode *
00086 MathCursor::moveDown() {
00087         if (level == 0) return current;
00088         --level;
00089         targetlevel = level;
00090         cerr << "down:" << level << '\t' << targetlevel << endl;
00091         current = ancestry[level];
00092         return current;
00093 }
00094 MMLNode *
00095 MathCursor::moveUp() {
00096         targetlevel++;
00097         MMLNode *node = ancestry[level+1];
00098         if (!node) {
00099                 node = current->lastChild();
00100         }
00101         if (node) {
00102                 current = ancestry[++level] = node;
00103                 if (!ancestry[level+1]) {
00104                         ancestry[level+1] = current->firstChild();
00105                 }
00106         }
00107         cerr << "up:" << level << '\t' << targetlevel << endl;
00108         return current;
00109 }
00110 MMLNode *
00111 MathCursor::moveRight() {
00112         MMLNode *last = 0;
00113         MMLNode *node = current;
00114         do {
00115                 last = node;
00116                 node = moveNext();
00117         } while ((node != last || node->isText())
00118                         && (node->firstChild() || level > targetlevel)
00119                         && level != targetlevel
00120                         || hasTextChildren(node));
00121         return current;
00122 }
00123 MMLNode *
00124 MathCursor::moveLeft() {
00125         MMLNode *last = 0;
00126         MMLNode *node = current;
00127         do {
00128                 last = node;
00129                 node = movePrevious();
00130         } while ((node != last || node->isText())
00131                         && (node->firstChild() || level > targetlevel)
00132                         && level != targetlevel
00133                         || hasTextChildren(node));
00134         return current;
00135 }
00136 bool
00137 MathCursor::hasTextChildren(const MMLNode *node) const {
00138         if (!node) return false;
00139         const MMLNode *child = node->firstChild();
00140         while (child) {
00141                 if (child->isText()) return true;
00142                 child = child->nextSibling();
00143         }
00144         return false;
00145 }
00146 int
00147 MathCursor::nearness(const MMLNode *n) const {
00148         int i;
00149         for (i=0; i<=int(level) && ancestry[level-i] != n; ++i);
00150         if (i > int(level)) i = -1;
00151         return i;
00152 }
00153 bool
00154 MathCursor::beforeNode(const MMLNode *n) const {
00155         return ancestry[level+1] == n;
00156 }
00157 bool
00158 MathCursor::afterNode(const MMLNode *n) const {
00159         return ancestry[level+1] == 0 && n == current->lastChild();
00160 }
